info.description: Add counter for Google results to my userstyles: GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Add Support too for: - FaviconizeGoogle:
info.additionalInfo: Add counter for Google results to my userstyles: GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Add Support too for: - FaviconizeGoogle: but after its update we need to re include Google Changes: v.16.../ v.39: - Work for Infinite Scroll results (count results from first to last page loaded) - Adaptation for video search and FaviconizeGoogle change
